item.description:
Join us for free discussion on a topic to be determined. Suggestions so far include the economic aspect of Peak Oil, and the connection of Peak Oil to the Iraq war. Since we've been meeting for a number of months now, maybe it's time to start talking about goals for the short and medium-term. (Maybe too soon for long-term?)

We will start the discussion at 6:30 in the O'Natural's meeting room, and go until 8:30 (or they throw us out). Anyone who wishes to eat there first, let's meet at 6 in the dining area.
item.name: Portland Maine Oil Awareness February Meetup
